messages.title: OUR CONTRACT WITH THE PEOPLE
messages.content: A clear Brexit timetable. A new political system that works for the majority. An Economic plan to boost British business and regions. An NHS 'fit for purpose'. A rational approach to immigration that treats all comers equally. A national debate about fixing our broken education system. A proper discussion about the future of farming, fishing, and our armed forces. A fairer deal to those living outside of London. A crackdown on waste and unnecessary spending.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A new political system that works for the majority.
An Economic plan to boost British business and regions.
A rational approach to immigration that treats all comers equally.
A national debate about fixing our broken education system.
A proper discussion about the future of farming, fishing, and our armed forces.
A fairer deal to those living outside of London.
A crackdown on waste and unnecessary spending.

mentions.tacticalSituation: There are around 130 seats that the Conservatives haven't won in at least 50 years. Only the Brexit Party can beat Corbyn's Labour in many of these seats.

issues.economy: An Economic plan to boost British business and regions.
issues.education: A national debate about fixing our broken education system.
issues.governance: A new political system that works for the majority.
issues.immigration: A rational approach to immigration that treats all comers equally.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am standing in this general election because we need to transform politics for good.

politicalExperience.achievements: Exposing waste and excess at the heart of the EU.

images.caption: Nigel Farage holding a Brexit Party leaflet.
